eu.lestard.assertj.javafx.api

Class LongBindingAssert

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.assertj.core.api.AbstractAssert<LongBindingAssert,LongBinding>
      • eu.lestard.assertj.javafx.api.LongBindingAssert
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.assertj.core.api.Assert<LongBindingAssert,LongBinding>, org.assertj.core.api.Descriptable<LongBindingAssert>, org.assertj.core.api.ExtensionPoints<LongBindingAssert,LongBinding>

    public class LongBindingAssert
extends org.assertj.core.api.AbstractAssert<LongBindingAssert,LongBinding>
    Assertion methods for LongBindings.

    To create an instance of this class, invoke Assertions.assertThat(LongBinding).

        public LongBindingAssert dependsOn(Observable observable)
        Verifies that the actual Binding is bound and depends on the given Observable value.
